title: Refund Request Event Schema
description: Schema for events triggered when a refund request is initiated in the system. This schema defines the structure for handling refund requests, including validation of amounts, currencies, and reasons.

amount.description: The amount to be refunded in decimal format. Must match the original payment amount or be less for partial refunds.

currency.description: Three-letter ISO currency code for the refund. Must match the currency of the original payment.

payment_id.description: Unique identifier of the original payment transaction that is being refunded.

reason.description: The reason for requesting the refund. Helps in tracking and analyzing refund patterns.

metadata.description: Additional contextual information about the refund request

request_id.description: Unique identifier for this refund request

requested_at.description: Timestamp when the refund was requested

requester_id.description: Identifier of the user or system requesting the refund

notes.description: Additional notes or comments about the refund request
